verses.name: Genesis 25:25
verses.text: And the first came out red, all over like an hairy garment; and they called his name Esau.

verses.name: Genesis 25:26
verses.text: And after that came his brother out, and his hand took hold on Esau’s heel; and his name was called Jacob: and Isaac was threescore years old when she bare them.

verses.name: Genesis 25:27
verses.text: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents.

verses.name: Genesis 25:28
verses.text: And Isaac loved Esau, because he did eat of his venison: but Rebekah loved Jacob.
